OOC: Are you still in beast mode?

BIC: Megatron tries to muster enough energy with Prowl landing on him,
to stay sturdy in midair, as the maximal twists downard trying to pull
him with him. Through gritted teeth, Megatron replies. "See you in the
inferno." as his recoil cannon folds under his arm, and fires into the
Maximal.
